Bolsa de Valores de Cabo Verde (Cape Verde Stock Exchange) bụ mgbanwe ngwaahịa nke Cape Verde
Ọ dị na mpaghara Achada Santo António nke Praia
Cape Verde Stock Exchange (BVC) hiwere na Mee 11 1998 site na mkpebi gọọmentị
Na njedebe nke 2017, isi ahịa ahịa bụ ijeri 68.4 escudos,  nke ruru nde euro 621.
Usor Nhazi arụ ọrụ nke mgbanwe ngwaahịa ngwaahịa Cape Verde na-ejikọta sistemu ịre ahịa yana sistemu ndị na-akpata nhota iji kwado Oke ahịa
Ahịa ahụ tinyere nnukwu mbọ iji hazie onwe ya n'ụzọ kwekọrọ na omume kachasị mma yana ụkpụrụ nduzi mba ụwa kachasị mkpa
All nyiwe niile bụ ndị a pụrụ ịtụkwasị obi na ụfọdụ na-eji Euronext Lisbon na Interbolsa.
BVC bụ onye otu African Securities Exchanges Association.
